thread.title: FilmWeek: ‘Steve Jobs,’ ‘Pan,’ ‘The Final Girls’ and more
thread.title_full: FilmWeek: ‘Steve Jobs,’ ‘Pan,’ ‘The Final Girls’ and more

author: FilmWeek
title: FilmWeek: ‘Steve Jobs,’ ‘Pan,’ ‘The Final Girls’ and more
text:
Share on Facebook 
Larry Mantle and KPCC film critics Amy Nicholson and Andy Klein review this week’s new movie releases, including the Aaron-Sorkin-penned biopic about Apple founder “Steve Jobs,” Hugh Jackman starring in the family flick, “Pan,” the well-received comic horror, “The Final Girls,” and more. TGI-FilmWeek! Guests: 
Andy Klein , Film Critic for KPCC and the LA Times Community Newspaper Chain 
Amy Nicholson , Film Critic for KPCC and Chief Film Critic, LA Weekly
